user_instruction: 'Assist me in responding to Alex Johnson'"'"'s email about the exam topics (alex.johnson@uniriv.edu). You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Assistance Needed – Exam Email & Topic Details

Hi [Assistant/Team],

Could you please:

1. Open my Gmail and pull the full text (including any attachments) of Alex Johnson’s recent message about the forthcoming exam (sender: alex.johnson@uniriv.edu).
2. Check our Notion workspace (Course → Exam → Study Guide) and gather:
   • The current list of exam topics/chapters  
   • Any linked study resources or guidance notes  
   • Relevant dates or deadlines mentioned there

Please send me:
• A copy of Alex’s email  
• The consolidated list of exam topics/resources, with page or link references  
• Any additional deadlines that appear in either source

This will let me craft an accurate response for Alex.  
Many thanks!

Best,  
Jane

final_output:
